org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt

Interface KeyManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsymmetricKeyManager, RecipientKeyManager, SymmetricKeyManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileKeyManager, DummyKeyManager, FileKeyManager, SpringDefaultFileKeyManager

    public interface KeyManager
    Base interface for a KeyManager in charge of maintaining symmetric and asymmetric keys. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-09-14.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getProvider(Context context)
      Method to return the Security Provider to use in given context.

    • Method Detail

      • getProvider

        java.lang.String getProvider(Context context)
        Method to return the Security Provider to use in given context.
        Parameters:
        context - the related context
        Returns:
        the provider to use.
